items.title: Jersey City Proposes Legislation to Legalize Airbnb
items.abstract: Mayor Steven M. Fulop anticipates a 6 percent hospitality tax would generate between $600,000 and $1 million annually on the more than 300 Airbnb listings in the city.

items.title: I Designed Algorithms at Facebook. Here’s How to Regulate Them.
items.abstract: Fixing how central they are to the platform’s content moderation could be the answer to its woes.

items.title: Design Thinking for Media That Matters
items.abstract: Eight New York Times product managers and engineers recently participated in Matter’s media startup accelerator bootcamp. Here’s some insight into what we learned.

items.title: Yahoo’s Design Chief to Depart
items.abstract: Though the company’s Web page redesigns have received negative reviews, Tim Parsey, senior vice president of user experience design, said his work was done.

items.title: Uber Cuts Fares in 48 Cities, Raising Some Concern Among Drivers
items.abstract: Uber said the fare cuts would help drivers “beat the winter slump” by generating business in the months after the busy holiday season.
